#text=Where I live , I always need to take a public bus to the train station to get to my destinations .
#text=The bus is not usually on schedule so sometimes this can be frustrating especially on a cold winter day as you are waiting for a bus .
#text=Since the discovery of a bustimes app on my iphone , i am able to know exactlly when my bus arrives using their GPS technology .
#text=It is accurate most of the times .
#text=I get ready to leave my house , look at my bustimes app to see when the bus is arriving , and then leave my house to catch the bus without wasting my time waiting for the bus .
#text=I pay the fare getting on the bus , greet the driver with a smile , and find a seat to sit down .
#text=It is a short ride to my train station where i can get on the train to my final destination .
